name: Neon Jump Beta V0.2
description:
Neon Jump is a simple game where you complete tricky parkour levels to finish the game. 

The game is currently in early beta testing. We are working to update the player movement, graphics, and music. Additionally, we are adding more levels for the next beta version. 

This is the first official game from Infinity Software and is currently acting as a testbed while I familiarize myself with the basics of game development. I hope you enjoy this small beta version of Neon Jump!

Known Bugs: Character will not fall when movement against a wall is continued, No exit buttons on levels 1-3, certain parts of the background are visible at the edges of the screen.
